snippet: After their dominating victory Sunday over the 49ers, the Giants are looking for repeat performances in bridging last year’s Super Bowl season to this year’s 4-2 start.
abstract: New York Giants dominating victory over San Francisco 49ers has renewed confidence that team can still build a bridge to another Super Bowl season after its 4-2 start.
lead_paragraph: After their dominating victory Sunday over the 49ers, the Giants are looking for repeat performances in bridging last year’s Super Bowl season to this year’s 4-2 start.

headline.seo: Giants Hope to Keep Up All-Around Play Exhibited Against 49ers
headline.main: Giants Pleased With All-Around Play Against 49ers
headline.print_headline: Giants Pleased With All-Around Play vs. 49ers
